title: Digitus 233
description: When Zeph, the adventurous son of a millionaire hid in the cargo hold of the Learjet carrying his brother Zander to camp he had no idea there was anything dark or ominous going on. That was until he watched Zander ejected from the plane onto a barren arctic island and Zeph found himself headed for South America. Will Zeph be able to uncover the truth behind Digitus, the worldâ€™s dominant corporation or will they succeed in their sinister plan to control his brother and destroy the world?
author: K.D. Emerson
